DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate clinical efficacy safety Sodium Glucose Co-transporter 2 ( SGLT2 ) inhibitor , ipragliflozin , dose 50mg 100mg , Type II Diabetes usual care . It also investigate analyze exploratory influential factor ipragliflozin treatment clinical efficacy safety .
DOC.brief_title: Investigation Clinical Efficacy Safety Ipragliflozin 50mg 100mg Type II Diabetes
